text: 2.5 1 Ko 9.25-26, 2 Ti 4.8 Anɨb ak tek, bɨ penpen taw asɨk lɨpal okok, bɨ kod mɨdeb okok kɨli apal apal tek nep kɨdek gɨnɨgel. Bɨ olap pen ne apal apal tek nep kɨdek ma genɨgab, tap teplep anɨb ak ma dɨnɨgab. Pen bɨ kɨles tɨmel gɨtep gɨl, apal apal tek nep gɨnɨgab ak, tap teplep ak ne dɨnɨgab.
